title: Update visual theme and add Download Bill button (ZWEETI Pro reference design)

requirements.text: Update the visual theme across App.tsx, BillingForm.tsx, and BillSummary.tsx to match the ZWEETI Pro reference design: use grey background (#f2f2f2) for the page, white card container (420px wide, rounded corners, box-shadow), orange accent #ff5722 for headings, table header backgrounds, and primary buttons, dashed borders for table rows, and a centered layout.
acceptanceCriteria: Card container is white, 420px wide, with rounded corners and a subtle box-shadow
Headings and table header backgrounds use orange #ff5722

requirements.text: Add a 'Download Bill' button styled in blue (#2196f3) with white text, placed alongside the existing Print Bill button in the actions area of App.tsx. Clicking it should generate and download a plain-text or HTML representation of the current bill (customer name, items, subtotal, GST, grand total) as a file named 'zweeti-bill.txt'. The Download Bill button must also be hidden during print.
acceptanceCriteria: A 'Download Bill' button is visible next to the Print Bill button
The button is styled with blue (#2196f3) background and white text
Clicking the button triggers a file download named 'zweeti-bill.txt' containing the full bill details
The Download Bill button is hidden when the browser's print dialog is triggered

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/main.tsx
Do not change the existing Zweeti 13-item menu in BillingForm.tsx
Do not alter the GST (5%) calculation logic
nonGoals: Adding new menu items or changing existing prices
